## The Fundamental Equation

Behold, our guiding formula:

::: {.spell .force .kamehameha .pokemon-move}
$Y = \beta_0 + \beta_1X_1 + \beta_2X_2 + \epsilon$
:::

Where:
- Y is our dependent variable
- X is our independent variable
- Îµ is the error term

## Casting Our Analysis Spell

```r
model <- lm(output ~ investment + innovation, data = realm_data)
summary(model)
```
